code: import*as React from'react';import Button from'@mui/material/Button';import{Grid}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const bottonContainer={justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center'};export default function BuySellButtons(props){const{active,setActive}=props;const handleClick=event=>{setActive(event.target.id);};const roundedButtonBuy={borderRadius:55,width:'128px',color:active==="buy"?'white':"#666666",backgroundColor:active==="buy"?"#454545":'#222222'};const roundedButtonSell={borderRadius:55,width:'128px',color:active==="sell"?'white':"#666666",backgroundColor:active==="sell"?"#454545":'#222222'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{sx:bottonContainer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{sx:roundedButtonBuy,onClick:e=>handleClick(e),id:"buy",children:"Buy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{sx:roundedButtonSell,onClick:e=>handleClick(e),id:"sell",children:"Sell"})]});}
